name: SEAL Team 12
description: When evil lurks on the horizon, you need the best. You need the strongest. You need SEAL Team 12! As a member of SEAL Team 12, you must battle through massive enemy waves and break the enemies spine with the force of truth, justice and explosions!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2.4 Ghz or faster (x86) or (x64) Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
